Name: Robin Hood
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: American readers might consider this an Apple Martini based on rum.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2002 by Tony Conigliaro at The Lonsdale in Notting Hill, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Robin Hood contains 177 calories
